mapper.insert: INSERT INTO retry_sharding ( gmt_create, instance_id, status, last_heartbeat) VALUES (now(), #{intanceId}, #{status}, #{lastHeartbeat})
mapper.update: UPDATE retry_sharding rs JOIN ( SELECT id FROM retry_sharding WHERE last_heartbeat < (NOW() - INTERVAL 360 SECOND) order by id limit 1 ) AS tmp SET rs.status = #{status}, rs.instance_id = #{instanceId}, rs.last_heartbeat = NOW() WHERE rs.id = tmp.id
